dim cn as sql::connection ?cn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\a5v10\MDBFiles\Northwind.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") ?cn.Execute("select * from customers where customerId = 'bergs'") = .T. rs = cn.ResultSet x = rs.data("companyname") ?x = "Berglunds snabbköp" ?convert_utf8_to_acp(x) = "Berglunds snabbk p" y = convert_utf8_to_acp(x) ?y
